DOC.detailed_description: Individuals prediabetes assign treatment group . Classes occur online . Participants evaluate 0 , 8 , 16 week . Our main outcome interest HbA1c ( glycated hemoglobin , measure indicative blood glucose level tie diabetes severity ) 16 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Selfreported clinical diagnosis prediabetes occur within past year . 2 . Aged 18 year old old 3 . Per Centers Disease Control Prevention Diabetes Prevention Recognition Program selfreported body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 24 kg/m2 ( ≥ 22 kg/m2 Asian ) . 4 . Willing able participate intervention sufficient control food intake . Must ability make choice food eat ; lifestyle eat meal . ) Exclusion criterion 1 . Unable provide inform consent . 2 . Insulin diabetes medication metformin alter safety diet , ensure great safety , exclude diabetic use insulin medication besides metformin . 4 . A substance abuse , mental health , medical condition , opinion investigator , make difficult potential participant participate intervention . Such condition may include : cancer , liver failure , unstable coronary artery disease , severe emphysema , binge eat disorder history binge eat disorder , bulimia strong history bulimia . 5 .
